name: queryVolumeGroup
description: Get summary of all Volume Groups.

effective_sla_domain_id.description: The ID of the SLA Domain that controls the protection of the Volume Group.

primary_cluster_id.description: The ID of the Rubrik cluster that provides primary protection for the Volume Group.

limit.description: Limit the number of matches returned.

offset.description: Ignore these many matches in the beginning.

is_relic.description: Specifies whether the results should contain only Volume Groups that are accessible on the Rubrik cluster.

name.description: The name of the Volume Group.

sla_assignment.description: The type of SLA assigned to the Volume Group.

sort_by.description: The Volume Group attribute to use in storing the responses. Valid attributes are `name` and `effectiveSlaDomainName`.

sort_order.description: The order to sort the responses. Valid choices are asc (ascending) or desc (descending).
